Notes.Text: These are all security issues fixed in the opencloud-server-5.0.2-1.1 package on the GA media of openSUSE Tumbleweed.
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Vulnerabilities.Description: REVA is an interoperability platform. Prior to 2.42.3 and 2.40.3, a bug in the GRPC authorization middleware of the "Reva" component of OpenCloud allows a malicious user to bypass the scope verification of a public link. By exploiting this via the the "archiver" service this can be leveraged to create an archive (zip or tar-file) containing all resources that this creator of the public link has access to. This vulnerability is fixed in 2.42.3 and 2.40.3.
